name: The Monogram 8 x 20 Carved Sign
description:
Family Plaque

NEW Website CLICK HERE TO BUY I am no longer selling from this site, please see above link for all my signs

Each sign is custom engraved with the name of the family you provide me. I use a router to carve each letter, then the sign is hand painted/distressed/aged, and then clear coated for a durable finish that will last a lifetime. ________________________________________________________________________ ** ABOUT CUSTOMIZATION ** All of my signs are hand crafted when ordered. This listing is for the layout and fonts shown in the pictures above. The Name and Date can be displayed anyway you wish (ie. “The Wilsons” or The Wilson Family”) (Est. May 28, 2012 or Established 2012) . You can also leave the date off or replace with a small quote. Please pick from my color chart for the sign color and the engraving color. I LOVE to customize signs to have your favorite saying, custom color, size, or adding a logo. Just message me with your request and I'll be happy to send you a quote. ________________________________________________________________ ** ABOUT THIS SIGN ** * Measurements are approx 20" Long , 7.75" Tall , and 3/4 " Thick. * Each Sign includes 1 sawtooth hanger on the back for hanging. * This Sign is hand painted and has 4 coats of a hand rubbed finish. * Intended for indoor use. ________________________________________________________________________ ** HOW TO ORDER ** When checking out please make sure you let us know: (in the note to seller box in paypal after login) 1. The name as you want it 2. The est. date as you want it 3. Sign color 4. Engraving color After you order, a draft of your custom sign will be sent for your approval via etsy conversation in 1-2 days. ________________________________________________________________________ ** SENDING AS A GIFT** I offer gift wrapping with a note card sent directly to the recipient. ($4.50) I also have just the note card if you would like to send a message with your gift. ($1.00) Please add these options when making your sign purchase. Gift Wrapping... ________________________________________________________________________ ** SHIPPING :** All Signs are packaged in a protective bubble wrap, I do not include a copy of the invoice. Packages are shipped via USPS or UPS in aprox. 23 days of your order. If you require expedited shipping, please contact me for options. Verify that your shipping address is correct when checking out, if you need it sent to another address you must change the address when checking out in Paypal at the time you place your order. As always, let me know if you have any questions at all....and have a wonderful day!
